Summary Accomplished and motivated Training Professional with a wide-range of experience in developing, managing, planning, conducting, and coordinating various training programs. Able to recognize and resolve organization training and employee developmental problems through identifying training needs, developing training programs and classes, implementation of innovative solutions, and direct evaluation and measurement of the results. A responsible and resourceful person, who enjoys learning new products and processes, gains new experience quickly, comfortable working in a team setting or as an individual contributor. Project/Program Management

Safety Leadership Experience Learning & Development/LEAN Coordinator BASF August 2012  – Present (3 years 1 month) Freeport, TX Developed and implemented a world class training program to provide a highly effective, high performing, motivated, and safe workforce focused on continuous improvement by: 
• Collaborating with external resources to analyze the needs, design, develop, implement, document, and measure the effectiveness of training 
• Coaching and developing department employees to establish a high performance culture 
• Supported safe, reliable performance of duties by ensuring departments comply with Site, Corporate, Quality and regulatory standards related to operating procedures, and MOCs (Management of Change) 
• Collaborated with Corporate and peer L&D Coordinators to drive best practices and consistency of training across the site 
Developed and implemented a standardized training process that complies with regulatory/Corporate requirements (EHS, PSM, ISO, GMP, FDA) by: 
• Working with Corporate L&D and peers to develop processes, tools and templates to deliver standardized training 
• Enhancing skills to include adult learning methodologies and ability to deliver one on one coaching and instruction. 
• Maintaining, updating and auditing training documents and procedures as required 
• Coordinating and documenting training across site, including items such as safety training, process safety training, emergency response training 
• Facilitated, developed, and implemented Lean methodologies to achieve greater efficiency and continuous improvement within department. Training Consultant (Johnson & Johnson McNeil) Validant May 2012  –  August 2012  (4 months) Lancaster, PA • Identify Curriculum Owners  
• Communicate new/revised documents to Curriculum Owners and Functional Area Management  
• Consult with Curriculum Owners and Functional Area Management on training requirements  
• Ensure consistent use of the curriculum structure and nomenclature  
• Maintain RBC/QRBC Index  
• Manage the biennial review of Curriculum with Curriculum Owners  
• Attend Curriculum Definition/LMS Administrator Community of Practice (COP)  
• Develop and maintain strong customer-focused relationships with business owners Training and Development Specialist Bristol-Myers Squibb February 2010  –  January 2012  (2 years) Mt Vernon, IN Training and Development Learning Specialist supporting the site Technical Training and Development process through design, development, and delivery of cGMP, technical, and job function training. Developing training strategies to meet organizational needs, and ensuring employees complete department training requirements. 
• Design, develop, and deliver cGMP, technical and job function training (both classroom and e-learning). 
• Work with Subject Matter Experts to determine appropriate training strategies for employee learning. 
• Coordinates, schedules, and conducts orientation training for new hire BMS and temporary employees. 
• Work with operational areas to design job curriculums, skill assessments, and associated training materials for structured on-the-job training (OJT). 
• Develop training materials in a clear and concise format with appropriate version control and document management guidelines. 
• Implement and maintain system for reporting training metrics; ensure site training data is recorded appropriately in the site Learning Management System (Plateau). 
• Conduct training needs analysis, effectiveness checks, and trend results as appropriate. 
• Oversee Shift Trainer program. 
• Implement and maintain training schedules for the site (cGMP, EHS, SOP, and etc…). 
• Lead training projects to support site objectives (new equipment installation, new process initiatives, Quality Event Training). Coordinate all aspects of training project including developing project estimates, schedule, and budget. 
• Facilitated, developed, and implemented Lean methodologies to include Waste Walks, 5S, Standard Work Instructions, Visual Management, and Value Stream Mapping in order to help achieve greater efficiency and continuous improvement on the shop floor. Summary Training and OD Professional with 27+ years industry experience, including high-tech (15 years at Intel), manufacturing, and healthcare. Expert in designing, developing, and implementing enterprise-wide learning, organizational effectiveness, and change programs. I have a BA in Education and an MA in Organizational Development. 
 
Specializing in all aspects of training and OD program implementation, I have managed staffs of 20+ and budgets of up to $2.5M.  
 
Talents:  
* Training Program Management including New Employee and New Manager Onboarding and Orientation, employee development courses and webinars, and Management/Leadership Development programs including frontline, high-potential, and executive.  
* Organizational Development including visioning, strategic planning, org redesign, coaching, change and transition management, performance management, benchstrength and succession planning, competency models management and 360 Assessment, employee engagement surveys, and LMS selection and implementation.  
* Instructional Design and Facilitation experience with an extensive list of workshops I have developed and/or instructed. 
 
Specialties:  
* Professional assessment expertise/certifications: Myers-Briggs, DiSC, LSI 
* 360 Degree Assessments: Survey of Management Practices: Survey of Leadership Practices: Leadership with Emotional Intelligence; DDI Leadership Mirror 
* Employee Engagement (Gallup Q12 certified) 
* Certified DDI Facilitator 
* Prosci certified.
